nodes.text: Grunnrurr was an area of the planet Kashyyyk, the homeworld of the Wookiee species located in the Mid Rim's Mytaranor sector. During the Clone Wars, volunteers from Grunnrurr were amongst those that joined the Wookiee Army that fought alongside the Grand Army of the Republic to defend the city of Kachirho in the Wawaatt Archipelago from the Separatist Droid Army during Battle of Kashyyyk in 19 BBY.

In the new Star Wars canon, Grunnrurr was first mentioned in the third issue of De Agostini's Star Wars Bust Collection magazine series, which was published in 2021. The region originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where the area was first mentioned as a city in a Databank entry on StarWars.com for the character Tarkov.
